comments.body:
Seems like this function is not called from within the module.
You are missing the validate function that calls validation on each param.
Reference: https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/modules/network/junos/junos_vlan.py#L131-L137
https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/modules/network/junos/junos_vlan.py#L175
